mapper.select: SELECT video_key, video_title, area, center_name, view_cnt, date_format(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS reg_date FROM video;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO video (video_title, area, center_name) VALUES (#{videoTitle}, #{area}, #{centerName});
mapper.update: UPDATE video SET video_title = #{videoTitle}, area = #{area}, center_name = #{centerName}, reg_date = now() WHERE video_key = #{videoKey}
mapper.select: SELECT video_comment.v_comment_id, video_comment.v_comment_content, date_format(video_comment.v_comment_reg, '%Y-%m-%d') AS v_comment_reg, video_comment.delete_yn, video_comment.user_id FROM video_comment LEFT OUTER JOIN video ON video_comment.video_key = video.video_key WHERE video_comment.video_key = #{videoKey} AND video_comment.delete_yn = 'N';
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO video_comment (v_comment_content, video_key, user_id) VALUES (#{vCommentContent}, #{videoKey}, #{userId});
mapper.update: UPDATE video_like SET like_yn = CASE WHEN like_yn = 'N' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END WHERE video_key = #{videoKey};
mapper.select: SELECT video.video_key, video.video_title, video.area, video.center_name, video.view_cnt, date_format(video.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS reg_date FROM video LEFT OUTER JOIN video_like ON video.video_key = video_like.video_key AND video_like.like_yn = 'Y' WHERE video_like.user_id = #{userId};
